scripts.example: watchify -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] example/js/*.jsx -o example/js/index.js
scripts.watch: watchify -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/*.jsx -o dist/react-input.js
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/*.jsx  > dist/react-input.js
